group_1.textCenter: It's no use...I can't think of anything...!
I'm more of an eater than a thinker...@I'm getting hungry after using my brain...

group_1.textRight: Please pull yourself together...!@You're a committee member!

group_1.textLeft: The more I think, the hungrier I get...
I want to eat Manaka's rice omelet...@Or maybe stew...
Hamburg steak...omelet...@Neapolitan croquette...cabbage roll...

group_1.textRight: Now is not the time to be thinking about food!
We have to do something about the arch!

group_1.textLeft: But, it's like they say, get mochi from a mochi@shop... You do cooking... I do eating...
...Get mochi from a mochi shop...
One should go to specialists for the best results...@Is that what you're saying?

group_1.textRight: I agree that we should leave it to the@professionals, but...
I doubt she actually put any thought into it.

group_1.textLeft: Well, if it wasn't so urgent...
We could ask a carpenter or a repair shop to@fix it...
It would've been nice if there was a specialist@in our school...

group_1.textRight: ...Specialist in our school? What about the@engineering teacher...?

group_1.textLeft: Engineering teacher...! I'm a home economics@major, so that didn't cross my mind...

group_1.textRight: Nice work, Tsumugi!

group_1.textLeft: There are tools in the engineering room.
If it's for the arch, they might be able to@give us some materials.

group_1.textRight: Plus, I'm sure the teacher knows a girl who's@good at engineering!

group_1.textLeft: I'll go get him right away!
How's it looking? Do you think we can fix it?

group_1.textRight: Hold on, give me a minute.

group_1.textLeft: Okay!
Seeds...
(I'll just put these away for now...)

group_1.textRight: ...I think this can be fixed with leftover materials@from class if there's enough manpower.

group_1.textLeft: Really?! I'm so glad!
Um...can you introduce us to a student who's@good at engineering?
We'll need their assistance.

group_1.textRight: Okay, I'll ask around.
Also, how about getting some of the prop makers@from the Drama Club to help out?

group_1.textLeft: Good idea, I'll consult them.

group_1.textRight: Could you send someone to help carry the@materials?

group_1.textLeft: Leave it to me! I'm good at heavy lifting.
I'll gather the committee members and@anyone else who's available.
Tsumugi, Manaka, may I trouble you to@handle things here?

group_1.textRight: We just make sure the arch is ready to be@worked on?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, please!

group_1.textCenter: Those of you who are free, please help us@repair it!
First, we need to move the arch somewhere@it can be worked on!

group_1.textLeft: I'm not good at manual labor, but...it's for@the school festival.

group_1.textRight: I'll go get the kids from my class!

group_1.textLeft: Looks like this is gonna be over in a flash.

group_1.textRight: Everyone's very cooperative.

group_1.textCenter: Excuse me! We could use some help!

group_1.textLeft: ...Fine, I'll do it...

group_1.textRight: ...Ugh...it's too much trouble...@Just do it with people who actually care.

group_1.textCenter: Not up for it...? I guess you don't like@manual labor?

group_1.textRight: Tsumugi, we're going to start moving it!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yes!
I'm glad it's fixed...

group_1.textRight: Thank goodness it wasn't too badly damaged!

group_1.textLeft: I'm glad, but...why was it just the base?

group_1.textRight: Hm?

group_1.textLeft: If I had to do it...
[bgEffect:shakeLarge]*Booooom*!
Wouldn't it be better to explode it?@Isn't that a little weird?

group_1.textRight: I don't think they'd go that far, but...
Maybe they had some other plan, or maybe@it was all they could do?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...it's weird...
